contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |name =Bakool |native_name = |other_name = |nickname = |motto = |settlement_type =[[Administrative divisions of Somalia|Region]] |image_skyline = |imagesize = |image_caption = |image_flag = |image_seal = |image_shield = |image_map =Somalia regions map Bakool.svg |mapsize =250px |map_caption =Location in Somalia. |coordinates_display =inline,title |coordinates_region =SO |coordinates_type =type:adm1st_region:SO |subdivision_type =Country |subdivision_name ={{flag|Somalia}} |subdivision_type1 = |subdivision_name1 = |seat_type =Capital |seat =[[Xuddur]] |government_type = |leader_title = |leader_name = |established_title = |established_date = |area_magnitude = |area_total_km2 = |population_as_of = |population_note = |population_total = |population_density_km2 = |timezone =[[East Africa Time|EAT]] |utc_offset = +3 |latd=4|latm=20|lats=47|latNS=N |longd=43|longm=32|longs=59|longEW=E |elevation_m = |elevation_ft = |postal_code_type = |postal_code = |area_code = |website = |footnotes = }} '''Bakool''' is a region (''[[Regions of Somalia|gobol]]'') in southwestern [[Somalia]].<ref name="Staros">[http://www.statoids.com/uso.html Regions of Somalia]</ref> ==Overiew== It is bordered by the [[Ogaden]] and the Somalian regions of [[Hiiraan]], [[Bay, Somalia|Bay]] and [[Gedo]]. Bakool, like Gedo and Bay, as well as most parts of the [[Jubbada Dhexe]] (Middle Juba) region, used to be a part of the old Upper Region, which was subdivided in the mid-1980s. It has its capital at [[Xuddur]]. ==Districts== The Bakool region consists of five districts:<ref name="Stados">[http://www.statoids.com/yso.html Districts of Somalia]</ref> *[[Ceelbare District]] *[[Tiyeegloow District]] *[[Waajid District]] *[[Xuddur District]] *[[Yed District]] ==Major towns== *[[Ceelbarde]] *[[Xuddur]] ==Notes== {{Reflist}} {{Somalia_Regions}} [[Category:Regions of Somalia]] [[Category:Bakool]] {{Somalia-geo-stub}}
